free_text.Learning outcomes: Acquire the knowledge necessary for understanding the structural systems. Choice of systems based on the projects Introduce students to new strategies for the structural design of buildings. Design the structural system from the development of the architectural project. [br/][br/]
free_text.Content: [b][i]A - Soil Mechanics [/b][/i][br/]1. Basic knowledge about the soil characteristics and soil properties.[br/][br/][b][i]B - Foundations[/b][/i][br/]1. Superficial foundations.[br/]2. Deep foundations.[br/]3. Special foundations.[br/][br/][b][i]C - Design of structural systems[/b][/i][br/]1. Systems and materials: wood, steel, concrete and composite structure.[br/]2. Structural and architectural choices objectives.[br/]3. Structure, form and space.[br/]4. Structural systems and deformations.[br/]5. Transmission of forces in the different types of structural forms.[br/]6. Computer-aided structural design: challenges and pitfalls.[br/]7. Complexity theory and singular topologies of structures.[br/]8. Relaxation dynamics.[br/]9. Design of structures with the principle of recursion.[br/]10. Iterations mathematics and formalization of the architectural space of the project based on the structural system.[br/]11. Dynamic stability systems.[br/]12. Topology of evolving forms.[br/]13. The active structural surfaces.[br/]14. Mathematical surfaces and non-Euclidean structure piece [i]"live"[/i] structure.[br/]

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Acquisition des connaissances indispensables pour la compréhension des systèmes structurels. Choix des systèmes en fonctions des projets. Initiations aux nouvelles stratégies de la conception structurelle des bâtiments. Concevoir le système structurel dès l'élaboration du projet architectural. [br/][br/]
